revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single Board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://wiki.radxa.com/Rock |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Radxa_Rock_Pro |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Radxa |model = Rock |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Pro |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3188; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.6GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F64G08CBABA; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63AFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN8720A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 54:E4:BD
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2014.01;; |stockos = Linux;3.0.36;Debian 8;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, Bluetooth 4.0, SPDIF, Audio out ()3.5mm), RTC w/ battery, IR remote, Microphone, LVDS, MIPI CSI, I2C, SPI, ADC, GPIO, |addchip = USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; ,,, Display and Audio Interface Controller;Rockchip;RK616;;1;,,, TVOUT, Audio-CODEC and HS-ADC Chip;Rockchip;RK1000-S;;1;,,, I2C Real Time Clock/Calendar;Haoyu Microelectronics;HYM8563;;1;,,, Power Management IC Controller;Active;ACT8846QM;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = rock |defaultpass = rock |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2013 |estprice = 89 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00KTHXDNK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723AS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3188 @1.6GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A9) *Onboard Storage: 8 GiB (NAND), :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8723AS (802.11bgn) *Network: 1x FE (10/100M) port *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG *GPIO: 2x 40-pin headers *Power Source: 5V DC Jack
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2013/09/07/radxa-rock-development-boards-with-rockchip-rk3188-are-available-for-developers-now/ ''Radxa Rock Development Boards with Rockchip RK3188'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
